description: The relative lack of swords meant that the skills needed to make these weapons were rare as well. As a result, swords were either of inferior quality, or relatively expensive. Importing Celtic or Roman weapons could solve this problem.
tooltip:
The relative lack of swords meant that the skills needed to make these weapons were rare as well. As a result, swords were either of inferior quality, or relatively expensive. Importing Celtic or Roman weapons could solve this problem.
All Melee Infantry +20% Hack and Pierce Attack.
